title: Downloads
summary: This is a list of MindmapsDB releases. It's the place to come to download the most recent versions of MindmapsDB.

title: Graql Shell
summary: The Graql shell is used to execute Graql queries from the command line, or to let Graql be invoked from other applications.

summary: How to construct and execute Graql queries programmatically in Java.

title: MindmapsDB Basics
summary: Introducing the basics of the MindmapsDB object model.

title: Scroll layout
summary: This page demonstrates how you the integration of a script called ScrollTo, which is used here to link definitions of a JSON code sample to a list of definitions for that particular term. The scenario here is that the JSON blocks are really long, with extensive nesting and subnesting, which makes it difficult for tables below the JSON to adequately explain the term in a usable way.

title: Graph API Overview
summary: A basic example of how to use MindmapsDB Graph API.

title: Quickstart Tutorial
summary: This document will teach you how to use Graql to load a schema and some data into a MindmapsDB Graph.

title: Resources
summary: Resources to help you learn more about graph databases.

title: MindmapsDB Setup Guide
summary: This document will teach you how to set up a MindmapsDB environment, start it up and load an example dataset to make a query using our query language, Graql.

title: Defining a Schema
summary: Demonstrates how to create a schema for a MindmapsDB knowledge graph.
